/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, providing a canopy of shade and a sense of tranquility. Buildings flank the street on both sides, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, which adds depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of nature and architecture, a characteristic feature of Beijing's urban landscape.
